pkgmetadata.longdescription: Requests-exoscale-auth======================Exoscale APIs support for Python-Requests.Installation:: pip install requests-exoscale-authUsage:.. code-block:: python import requests from exoscale_auth import ExoscaleAuth auth = ExoscaleAuth('my-key', 'my-secret') response = requests.get('https://portal.exoscale.com/api/account', auth=auth)
